title: Hand Written Font Similar to this one?
content:
Hi guys,  
Do you know of any Hand Written Font Similar to any of those? Sorry, i know the picture is not very big. Any similar font will do great! if it a free font the better because is a work for an NGO with very limited money.

Best,  
S

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [lacansem1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015105145/http:/typophile.com/files/lacansem1.jpg) | 44.34 KB |
| [22112010319.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015105145/http:/typophile.com/files/22112010319.jpg) | 194.03 KB |
author: uzapucax

comments.content: Some I like: [Olicana](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015105145/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/g-type/olicana), [Rollerscript](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015105145/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/g-type/rollerscript/), [Alberto](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015105145/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/corradine/alberto), [Suomi Hand Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015105145/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/suomi_type_foundry/suomi_hand_script_ot), [Tesla Font](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015105145/http:/www.tipometar.org/kolumne/TeslaFont/IndexEng.html) (reconstruction of Nikola Tesla's handwriting), [dearJoe 4](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015105145/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/joebob/dear-joe-4), [Signerica](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015105145/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mawns/signerica), [Ocalla Hand](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015105145/http:/www.youworkforthem.com/font/T3496/ocalla-hand), [John Handy](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015105145/http:/www.youworkforthem.com/font/T2342/john-handy)
That is very good info! Thanks Ryuk.
